Price: FOB USD 10000~20000 / Set Get Latest Price Minimum Order Quantity: 1 Set/Sets Port: Guangzhou Packaging Details: Carton with wooden shelf or case Delivery Time: 25~35days Payment Terms: T/T,MoneyGram Supply Ability: 5 Set/Sets per Month Ms. Renee Ng Place Order via Buyer Protection ensure your transaction safety By placing an order on Alibaba.com, you can: Ensure the safety of your transaction Receive assistance throughout the entire process «Prev Product 1 2 3 4 5 Next Product» Detailed Product Description
We provide one-stop service for you. Design, supplying the top quality equipments, also other relative untensils.
Commercial Restaurant Kitchen Projects
We provide one-stop service for you, who is going to open restaurant for yourself
or for your clients. You might not know what kind of equipment do you need. You
might not know if Chinese kitchen equipments are good enough for your standard.
You might not know which one to chose. You don't even know where to start. Don't
worry. Topkitch will help you to solve all the issue and concern by our years experience
to assist our clients' kitchen projects. No matter your restaurant is big, or small,
western one or eastern one, we will always be there if you would like to chose us as
your partner.
*What you need to do if you want to purchase the wholes set of kitchen equipments
from Topkitch which is in China, or your restaurants which are not in China?
